General.Name: e-Chat
General.Description: e-Chat is a decentralized Multi-Tasking Messenger with multi-cryptocurrency wallet features, allowing users to easily chat and send money in the same app. ECHT is an Ethereum-based ERC20 token used in the e-Chat platform. Payments made using ECHT token can be sent without any commissions. On top of that, the e-Chat wallet provides the opportunity of depositing money in USD and then withdrawing them via VISA and MasterCard.

ICO.Description:
e-Chat is a decentralized Multi-Tasking Messenger with multi-cryptocurrency wallet features, allowing users to easily chat and send money in the same app. ECHT is an Ethereum-based ERC20 token used in the e-Chat platform. Payments made using ECHT token can be sent without any commissions. On top of that, the e-Chat wallet provides the opportunity of depositing money in USD and then withdrawing them via VISA and MasterCard.

The e-Chat ICO will start on the 1st of January and will end on the 1st of March, 2018. The ICO supply represents 92% of the total coin supply and will be available for a 0.75 USD starting price. Users will be able to participate with ETH, BTC, LTC, ZEC and BTS. The funding cap is 15,000 ETH.

Token Reserve Split (8%):

  • 7% - Referral Program
  • 1% - Bounty Campaign

The ECHT ICO features a bounty campaign.
